name: Case No.0001: Abandoned house case
description:
Case N0.0001 : Abandoned House Case is a 3d puzzle game with good graphics and a little story.

The game tells the story of a detective who was assigned to study an abandoned house and find a package of documents with classified materials there. On the one hand, the matter is easy, but everything is not so simple, because the house is filled with riddles and secret passages that you will have to deal with.

  • *WASD* = move
  • *arrows* = move
  • *Mouse* = rotate your head
  • *Shift* = running
  • *E* = interact with something
  • *Space* = jump
  • *Escape* = menu
